org.springframework.data.mapping.model

接口 FieldNamingStrategy

  • 所有已知实现类:
    CamelCaseAbbreviatingFieldNamingStrategy, CamelCaseSplittingFieldNamingStrategy, PropertyNameFieldNamingStrategy, SnakeCaseFieldNamingStrategy

    public interface FieldNamingStrategy
    SPI to determine how to name document fields in cases the field name is not manually defined.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.9
    另请参阅:
    PropertyNameFieldNamingStrategy, CamelCaseAbbreviatingFieldNamingStrategy, SnakeCaseFieldNamingStrategy

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getFieldName(PersistentProperty<?> property)
      Returns the field name to be used for the given PersistentProperty.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFieldName

        String getFieldName(PersistentProperty<?> property)
        Returns the field name to be used for the given PersistentProperty.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty;
        返回:
